Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by West Texas in 1971...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1974, off Steven Hensley (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/5/1974, off Eric Gilmour (CC)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Penn on 6/10/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1977, hitting .485 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 7/13/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1979, hitting .517 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Gashouse on 7/23/1980...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 4/5/1981...
Traded from West Texas to Boston (UBA) on 4/29/1982 (Going to PIL: 1B W. Boydston, P B. Chappel, LF J. Robinson. Going to WT: P T. George, LF D. Perdomo, 3B S. Wesson)...
